stimulusHtml: A city is built around a circular lake that has a radius of 1 mile. The population density of the city is f (r) people per square mile, where r is the distance from the center of the lake, in miles. Which of the following expressions gives the number of people who live within 1 mile of the lake?
choicesHtml: 2π ∫ 0 1 r f( r )dr MathType@MTEF@5@5@@42F3@

2π ∫ 0 1 r ( 1+f( r ) )dr MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4638@

2π ∫ 0 2 r ( 1+f( r ) )dr MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4639@

2π ∫ 1 2 r f( r )dr MathType@MTEF@5@5@@42F5@

2π ∫ 1 2 r ( 1+f( r ) )dr MathType@MTEF@5@5@@463A@
